# Installing Roo Code

Roo Code is a VS Code extension that brings AI-powered coding assistance directly to your editor. Install using one of these methods:

1. **VS Code Marketplace (Recommended)** \- fastest method for standard VS Code and Cursor users
2. **Open VSX Registry** \- for VS Code-compatible editors like VSCodium

* * *

## VS Code Marketplace [​](https://docs.roocode.com/getting-started/installing\#vs-code-marketplace "Direct link to VS Code Marketplace")

1. Open VS Code
2. Access Extensions: Click the Extensions icon in the Activity Bar or press `Ctrl+Shift+X` (Windows/Linux) or `Cmd+Shift+X` (macOS)
3. Search for "Roo Code"
4. Select "Roo Code" by RooVeterinaryInc and click **Install**
5. Reload VS Code if prompted

After installation, find the Roo Code icon () in the Activity Bar to open the Roo Code panel.

![VS Code marketplace with Roo Code extension ready to install](https://docs.roocode.com/img/installing/installing-3.png)

_VS Code marketplace with Roo Code extension ready to install_

* * *

## Open VSX Registry [​](https://docs.roocode.com/getting-started/installing\#open-vsx-registry "Direct link to Open VSX Registry")

For VS Code-compatible editors without Marketplace access (like VSCodium and Windsurf):

1. Open your editor
2. Access the Extensions view
3. Search for "Roo Code"
4. Select "Roo Code" by RooVeterinaryInc and click **Install**
5. Reload if prompted

![Open VSX Registry with Roo Code extension ready to install](https://docs.roocode.com/img/installing/installing-3.png)

## _Open VSX Registry with Roo Code extension ready to install_ [​](https://docs.roocode.com/getting-started/installing\#open-vsx-registry-with-roo-code-extension-ready-to-install "Direct link to open-vsx-registry-with-roo-code-extension-ready-to-install")

## Roo Code Nightly [​](https://docs.roocode.com/getting-started/installing\#roo-code-nightly "Direct link to Roo Code Nightly")

For information on installing Roo Code Nightly (our prerelease build published on each merge to main), please see the [Roo Code Nightly](https://docs.roocode.com/advanced-usage/roo-code-nightly) guide in the Advanced Usage section.

* * *

## Manual Installation from VSIX [​](https://docs.roocode.com/getting-started/installing\#manual-installation-from-vsix "Direct link to Manual Installation from VSIX")

If you prefer to download and install the VSIX file directly:

1. **Download the VSIX file:**
   - Find official releases on the [Roo Code GitHub Releases page](https://github.com/RooCodeInc/Roo-Code/releases)
   - Download the `.vsix` file from the latest release
2. **Install in VS Code:**
   - Open VS Code
   - Access Extensions view
   - Click the "..." menu in the Extensions view
   - Select "Install from VSIX..."
   - Browse to and select your downloaded `.vsix` file

![VS Code's Install from VSIX dialog](https://docs.roocode.com/img/installing/installing-2.png)

_Installing Roo Code using VS Code's "Install from VSIX" dialog_

* * *

## Local Setup & Development [​](https://docs.roocode.com/getting-started/installing\#local-setup--development "Direct link to Local Setup & Development")

For instructions on setting up Roo Code for local development, building from source, or contributing, please see the [Local Development Setup](https://docs.roocode.com/advanced-usage/local-development-setup) guide in the Advanced Usage section.

* * *

## Troubleshooting [​](https://docs.roocode.com/getting-started/installing\#troubleshooting "Direct link to Troubleshooting")

![VS Code Output panel showing Roo Code logs for troubleshooting](https://docs.roocode.com/img/installing/installing-4.png)

_VS Code Output panel showing Roo Code logs for troubleshooting_

**Extension Not Visible**

- Restart VS Code
- Verify Roo Code is listed and enabled in Extensions
- Try disabling and re-enabling
- Check Output panel for errors (View → Output, select "Roo Code")

**Installation Problems**

- Ensure stable internet connection
- Verify VS Code version 1.84.0 or later
- If VS Code Marketplace is inaccessible, try the Open VSX Registry method

* * *

## Getting Support [​](https://docs.roocode.com/getting-started/installing\#getting-support "Direct link to Getting Support")

If you encounter issues not covered here:

- Join our [Discord community](https://discord.gg/roocode) for real-time support
- Submit issues on [GitHub](https://github.com/RooCodeInc/Roo-Code/issues)
- Visit our [Reddit community](https://www.reddit.com/r/RooCode)

[Edit this page](https://github.com/RooCodeInc/Roo-Code-Docs/edit/main/docs/getting-started/installing.mdx)

Last updated on **Oct 3, 2025**
